revised_title: Differential Gene Expression in Plants: The Role of Ribosomal RNA Genes
tldr: This article discusses the differential expression of ribosomal RNA genes in plants and their role in plant growth and development. The authors explore the mechanisms behind nucleolar dominance, including the differences in chromatin structure and cytosine methylation between active and inactive loci. They also investigate the role of short, repeated sequences in the regulation of gene expression and the origins of genetic variation affecting ribosomal RNA gene expression.
